title: Thursday Post Show (08-12-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (08-12-21)
description:
Bobby talks about a woman who tried to build her immune system by licking everything at a grocery store. Students are not allowed to wear pajamas in Zoom classes. Bobby also says he is done doing his lottery bit online because of how much money he’s lost. Bobby also talks about the rise of anti-showerers. Bobby also does an interview with Wayne D and gives a behind the scenes look at what videos he has to record after the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
